name: lens
description: A powerful plugin that will allow you to attach a camera to your player and use its rich API for some cool effects.

scripts.build: npx webpack && npm run build:minify && node add-version-script.js && node add-banner-script.js
scripts.build:prod: npx webpack --mode production && npm run build:minify && node add-version-script.js && node add-banner-script.js && npm run build:docs

author: https://github.com/doubleactii
